name: Confit Of Carrot And Cumin
keywords: carrot, cumin, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds carrots, preferably organic, trimmed and peeled (about 16 pieces)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 275 degrees. In a large casserole, combine carrots, cumin seed, olive oil, garlic, orange juice and zest. Season with salt and cayenne. Cover tightly with lid or aluminum foil.
On stove top, bring to a boil, then transfer to oven. Bake until a knife can easily be inserted into carrots, at least 2 hours. Just before serving, add cilantro.
